function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Diversification of network connections, promoting decentralized collaborations","category":"Diversification of network connections","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using wearables to manage symptoms and identify overexertion in individuals with long covid","category":"Use of wearables for symptom management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure equitable access to housing, water, and healthcare","category":"Equitable access to basic needs","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Support for children’s education","category":"Support for education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promoting hybrid work models and flexible workspace solutions","category":"Flexible work arrangements","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing data-driven decision-making processes","category":"Data-driven decision-making","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Canceling non-essential travel and encouraging remote communication to reduce the risk.","category":"Non-essential travel cancellation and remote communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhance indoor air filtration systems, implement ventilation control measures, and promote indoor air quality monitoring.","category":"Indoor air quality control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement interim data collection methods, analyze aggregated data with caution, prioritize timely release of microlevel data","category":"Data collection and analysis","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provision of immersive entertainment and psychotherapy through 5g-based vr/ar technologies","category":"Immersive entertainment and psychotherapy through 5G","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote flexible work arrangements, provide support for child care and domestic work, and address gender inequality in the workplace.","category":"Promote flexible work arrangements and gender equality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure accuracy and reliability of the expert system through thorough testing and validation","category":"Expert system testing and validation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Healthcare access and affordability","category":"Healthcare access and affordability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Optimize building envelope design to maximize natural ventilation and light, incorporate air purification systems, and promote indoor plant growth.","category":"Optimizing building design for ventilation and air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide clear guidelines for surface disinfection based on virus behavior","category":"Surface disinfection guidelines","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diversification of production networks, strengthening of domestic industries, international collaboration on risk management","category":"Diversification of production networks and risk management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of sustainable disinfection technologies","category":"Sustainable processes and tools","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaborative research efforts to reconcile contradictory findings and establish a consensus","category":"Collaborative research and consensus establishment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular calibration and validation of thermal scanning equipment.","category":"Thermal scanning equipment calibration and validation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of accurate and reliable sensor technology for cough and lung sound monitoring, integration with digital health platforms for real-time analysis.","category":"Sensor technology for health monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhance disinfection protocols, improve ventilation","category":"Enhanced disinfection and ventilation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing public health measures, supporting affected businesses, and providing financial aid to individuals","category":"Public health measures and coordination and cooperation among member states","category":"Coordination among member states","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regularly update and validate prior knowledge, incorporate real-time
